description: This is the bizarre story of Intels 10nm Cannon Lake that (almost) never saw the light of day. The Intel NUC on Amazon:  A much deeper dive on 10nm from Anandtech:   By using our Amazon affiliate links, you help to support the channel as we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.
